specific_question: What was our average employee onboarding time in Q1 2025?
answer: Average employee onboarding time was 30 days with a 10% decrease expected.
justification: Employee onboarding metrics are unrelated to CRM solutions and patient engagement
dr_question: How can MediConn Solutions leverage trendy new CRM solutions to improve patient engagement and retention, and what new CRM solutions are expected in 2025?
